itemDesc: Assembly Materials are a special class of advanced materials that are crafted and used in Facilities.
Coal is a raw resource specially designed to be refined into Coke, or used as fuel for Trains.
Coke is a type of resource required for various Facility processes.
Components (also known as Comps) are a type of rare raw resource that is refined to create higher tier materials.
Concrete Materials (also known as Concrete) is a Large Material used to build concrete structures. Its most distinctive feature is the horizontal black bar going across the burlap sack.
Diesel is a liquid resource in a 100L canister. It is one of the two main fuel types in Foxhole, alongside Petrol.
Enriched Oil is a late-game advanced liquid resource primarily used as fuel for certain vehicles and facility recipes. It is stored within a 30L canister.
Heavy Oil is an advanced liquid resource in a 30L canister.
Oil is a raw liquid resource that is used in various facility recipes. It is stored within a 50L canister.
Petrol is a liquid resource in a 50L canister. It is one of the two main fuel types in Foxhole, alongside Diesel.
A Pipe is a Large Material used in the construction of Pipelines for transporting liquids to various Facilities. It is a Large Item carried on a soldier's shoulder.
Rare Metals are a type of material in the game, which is used to produce and construct various structures and upgrades related to Large Ships, and Rockets.
Refined Materials (also known as rmats) are a type of production material used in the production of heavy vehicles, and equipment, such as combat vehicles.
Salvage (also known as Scrap) is one of the primary raw resources in the game, used in the production of numerous items and equipment.
A reinforced barrel of extremely explosive substances required for the deadliest warheads.
Sulfur is a type of rare raw resource that is refined to create higher tier materials.
